title: Numerical stabilization method by switching time-delay
abstract:
In this paper, we propose a new numerical strategy for the stabilization of
evolution systems. The method is based on the methodology given by Ammari,
Nicaise and Pignotti in "Stabilization by switching time-delay, Asymptot.
Anal., 83 (2013), 263--283". This method is then implemented in 1D by suitable
numerical approximation techniques. Numerical experiments complete this study
to confirm the theoretical announced results.
